Author: mardalfoosen
Text: The first rule of helping someone in the early stages of recovery is: don’t comment on the food, portions, nutrients, schedule, or weird shit like pouring the milk before the cereal unless you’re a medical professional or have been told to by one. So yes. Demote him from grocery duty.    I know it hurts to have your hard work trampled over but don’t take it personally it was probably a air head moment where he forgot to watch what he says.     Good luck with your recovery! :)
